x1 TO x2 y +- dy +- dsys 

ACKERSTAFF 98 EPJ C5,411 
PI0 fragmentation function 
E+ E- --> PI0 X 
SQRT(S) IN GEV 91.2 +- 2.0 
x = X(DEF=E(P=3)/E(P=1) 
y = (1/SIG(C=HAD))*D(SIG)/DX
